revision.comment: Scolaire moved page [[Talk:Diarmait mac Maíl na mBó]] to [[Talk:Diarmait mac Máel na mBó]]: per [[WP:COMMONNAME]]
revision.text: {{WikiProjectBannerShell|1= {{WPMILHIST|class=Start | |B-Class-1=no |B-Class-2=yes |B-Class-3=yes |B-Class-4=yes |B-Class-5=yes |Medieval-task-force=yes |Biography-task-force=yes }} {{WikiProject Biography|living=no |class=Start |military-work-group=yes |listas=Diarmait Mac Mail Na Mbo }} {{WikiProject Ireland|class=start |importance=mid}} }} ==Pronounciation== How do we pronounce the name in English?[[Special:Contributions/86.44.147.142|86.44.147.142]] ([[User talk:86.44.147.142|talk]]) 16:52, 10 May 2009 (UTC) /d'i:ərməd' mɑk mɑil' nə mo:/ or, roughly - "dearmwid mock mile nuh moe" (In modern Irish "Maíl" is "Maol" pronounced /me:l/ "male")[[User:Murchadh|Murchadh]] ([[User talk:Murchadh|talk]]) 00:57, 18 November 2009 (UTC) ==Meaning of Name== What is the meaning of "Máel na mBó"? Does this actually translate as "Servant of the Cows"? — Preceding [[Wikipedia:Signatures|unsigned]] comment added by [[Special:Contributions/75.167.195.84|75.167.195.84]] ([[User talk:75.167.195.84|talk]]) 03:53, 16 July 2013 (UTC) == Massive expansion required == It's amazing the great Diarmait mac Maíl na mBó has such a brief article. The extent of his involvements was vast. In case anyone was unaware, his modern descendants are the [[Gaelic nobility of Ireland|MacMurrough Kavanagh Princes of Leinster]],[http://www.hbci.com/~tiraha/leinster/mmk.html] through his notorious namesake [[Diarmait Mac Murchada]]. The family have been fighting over the title, and for wider recognition, for like a century or something. Another strange development has been the Prince of Leinster's "popular" exclusion from the list of claimants to the High Kingship, which the MacMurrough Kavanaghs rightly dispute, considering mac Maíl na mBó's spectacular career. A good person on occasion, I should probably discuss the whole [[Ard Rí]] claimants situation at more length in the [[Gaelic nobility of Ireland]] article. But I lack the time and resources for this king's article. If you see this post, please try contributing if you're able. Thank you. [[User:Nora lives|Nora lives]] ([[User talk:Nora lives|talk]]) 07:19, 15 December 2011 (UTC)
